description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work spans various domains, including decentralized systems, regenerative design, and global connectivity. yeehaa's blog posts explore concepts like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and the global village in the digital age. His curated courses cover topics such as personal growth, web innovation, and valuing differences. yeehaa's approach combines strategic thinking with practical action, emphasizing creativity, diversity, and open knowledge exchange to address global challenges and cultivate thriving, sustainable communities.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends academia and tech to transform education and foster inclusive internet ecosystems. His work explores decentralized systems, regenerative design, and global connectivity, aiming to cultivate thriving, sustainable communities.
